aimtraining.Description: 72h. reduce heavy attacks to 24h cooldown. doesn't stack.

adventuringgear.Description: 48h. increase your loot score by 1 for the rest of the game.

goodiebag.Description: 24h. add a random ready item to your inventory.

crookedabacus.Description: 48h. whenever you exchange or trade, gain a seed coin for the rest of the game.

drinkingmedal.Description: 48h. increase the damage of your light attack by 420 for the rest of the game.

tractor.Description: 48h. whenever you farm, gain an additional seed coin for the rest of the game.

lichitem.Description: 48h. when you would die, set your hp to 4200 instead.

critterihardlyknowher.Description: 48h. increase your crit rolls by 1 for the rest of the game.
